EmailTemplate.subject: Need help with your Associate Mentor application?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
560 NCS GRADUATES HAVE ALREADY APPLIED!
We're here to help make sure you can submit your application before April 30th. Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Want to apply but not sure how to do the application?
Come along to our Associate Mentor application drop-in session!
Where? Highgate Studios, 53-79 Highgate Road, London, NW5 1TL
When? Wednesday 27th April
What time? 5pm to 6pm
Who is running it? Julia from our NCS team - if you get lost on the way, you can contact her on 07867 551225
Ready to submit your application before then?
CLICK HERE TO APPLY!
Your application form is specific to you, and you can only submit it once.
Please make sure that you do not share the link to your form with anyone else - they must access it through the email they receive from The Challenge. Good luck!
NCS Graduates Team The Challenge
